### Latest posts

<div id="substack-feed" class="substack-posts">
  <p>Loading latest posts...</p>
</div>

<script>
const feedContainer = document.getElementById("substack-feed");
const feedUrl = "https://weiwang715.substack.com/feed";
const apiUrl = `https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=${encodeURIComponent(feedUrl)}`;

fetch(apiUrl)
  .then((response) => response.json())
  .then((data) => {
    if (!data || data.status !== "ok" || !data.items) {
      throw new Error("Feed unavailable");
    }
    const items = data.items.slice(0, 6);
    const list = document.createElement("div");
    list.className = "substack-post-list";
    items.forEach((item) => {
      const card = document.createElement("article");
      card.className = "substack-post";
      const title = document.createElement("h3");
      title.className = "substack-post-title";
      const link = document.createElement("a");
      link.href = item.link;
      link.target = "_blank";
      link.rel = "noopener";
      link.textContent = item.title;
      title.appendChild(link);
      const meta = document.createElement("p");
      meta.className = "substack-post-meta";
      const date = new Date(item.pubDate);
      meta.textContent = date.toLocaleDateString();
      card.appendChild(title);
      card.appendChild(meta);
      if (item.thumbnail) {
        const img = document.createElement("img");
        img.src = item.thumbnail;
        img.alt = item.title;
        img.loading = "lazy";
        img.className = "substack-post-thumb";
        card.appendChild(img);
      }
      if (item.description) {
        const excerpt = document.createElement("p");
        excerpt.className = "substack-post-excerpt";
        excerpt.textContent = item.description.replace(/<[^>]*>/g, "").slice(0, 160) + "...";
        card.appendChild(excerpt);
      }
      list.appendChild(card);
    });
    feedContainer.innerHTML = "";
    feedContainer.appendChild(list);
  })
  .catch(() => {
    feedContainer.innerHTML = '<p>Latest posts are available on <a href="https://weiwang715.substack.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Substack</a>.</p>';
  });
</script>
